intro: Hi, I am a developer driven by a passion for understanding, building, and refining technology. Let's create something amazing together!

about_paragraph_1.part1: I’m an enthusiastic and creative developer with a strong focus on
about_paragraph_1.part4: modular systems, building thoughtful user experiences, and structuring codebases
about_paragraph_1.part5: that are easy to extend and collaborate on.

about_paragraph_2.part1: Whether it’s client-side interfaces or backend logic, I aim for

ivalua.title: IVALUA - MONTPELLIER
ivalua.subtitle: Apprenticeship | 2023 (2 years)
ivalua.text: During my internship at Ivalua, a global leader in cloud-based procurement and spend management software, I worked on improving an internal tool used by the R&D team. My contributions helped streamline development workflows and enhance productivity across engineering teams.

harmonessens.title: HARMONESSENS - SAINT GELY DU FESC
harmonessens.subtitle: Freelance | 2024 (3 months)
harmonessens.text: I developed a website in React for a naturopath, featuring a custom-built appointment booking system with an integrated calendar. The site includes presentation, contact, and reservation pages.

degriff.title: DEGRIFF PC - SAINT GELY DU FESC
degriff.subtitle: Internship | 2021 (1 month)
degriff.text: Degriff PC is a local hardware store known for its personalized service and repair expertise. In addition to selling computer hardware, they operate a workshop offering device repairs.

epsi.title: EPSI - MONTPELLIER
epsi.subtitle: Master's Degree | 2023 - 2025
epsi.text: I joined EPSI in 2023 to pursue a Mastère in Information Systems. The program focuses on software architecture, DevOps, and data engineering.

cmi.title: CMI - MONTPELLIER SCIENCE UNIVERSITY
cmi.subtitle: Bachelor's Degree | 2020 - 2023
cmi.text: I completed the first three years of the CMI at Montpellier Science University, earning a Bachelor's as part of the selective FIGURE network.

remote_skills.title: Remote Work Experience
remote_skills.description: Comfortable working in a Scrum environment with daily standups and sprints.

remote_skills.title: Distributed Teams
remote_skills.description: Collaborated with international teams across multiple time zones and cultures.

remote_skills.title: Collaboration Tools
remote_skills.description: Proficient in Teams, Zoom, Jira, Trello, Notion, GitHub and other PM tools.

remote_skills.title: Asynchronous Communication
remote_skills.description: Skilled in writing clear documentation and communicating progress async.

remote_skills.title: Self-Discipline
remote_skills.description: Highly autonomous with strong time-management skills in remote settings.

remote_skills.title: Technical Setup
remote_skills.description: Experienced in maintaining a reliable home office with the tools and environment necessary for productive remote work.

projects.title: Creative Portfolio
projects.subtitle: UI/UX & Visual Design
projects.description:
A portfolio site crafted for a visual designer to showcase their work in branding, animation, and 3D design.

Built with React.

projects.title: Harmonessens
projects.subtitle: Wellness & Appointments
projects.description:
A calming and elegant website for a health practitioner. Users can learn about services and book personalized appointments through a fully custom-built scheduling system.

Built with React.ts and a MySQL backend.

projects.title: Chroma Lab
projects.subtitle: Video game development
projects.description:
A multiplayer puzzle game featuring various challenges and rooms to explore. Designed for cooperative play, it requires players to solve puzzles together to progress and escape the laboratory.

Developed by a team of two, alongside a game designer.

interests_subtitle: When I’m not coding, here’s what lights me up.
interest_para1: What truly fascinates me about computer science is understanding how things work at their core.
interest_para2: From a young age, I've been captivated by the process of discovering how systems, software, and algorithms come together and how we can use them to do as we please. It's not just about learning to code, it's about unraveling and mastering the logic behind the tools we use every day and how they shape our world. This curiosity fuels my desire to not only keep learning but also to bring my growing skills and knowledge into the teams I work with.
interest_para3: I'm passionate about applying what I know, collaborating with others, and using technology to create meaningful solutions.
interest_1_description: I hit the gym regularly, it keeps my head clear and trains my discipline.
interest_2_description: Art has always been a lasting passion of mine. I love sketching and creating things.
interest_3_description: I love listening to my favorite artists like IDKHow, Saint Motel or Glass Animals.
interest_4_description: I really enjoy playing video games, and even make some in my spare time.
interest_5_description: Flying my drone and capturing the world from above feels very liberating. I dream of taking it on a journey around the globe.
